text: D Answer: Given that at the time of Time Out, Congestion Window Size 5 is 32 KB and RTT = 100 ms, D When Time Out occurs, for the next round of Slow Start, size of congestion window Threshod = ——MMM—— 7 2 est Threshold = 16 KB swer Suppose we have a slow start=- 2 KB | 4 KB | 8 KB | 16 KB (As the threshold is reached, Additive increase starts) | 18 KB |20 KB | 22 KB | 24 KB | 26 KB | 28 KB | 30 KB | 32 KB Here | (vertical line) is representing RTT so the total number of vertical lines is 11 x 100 ms = 1100 msec and so this is the answer.
